entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone Harry should tell about his hurt scar. He is described as caring about Harry's scar.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is mentioned as the person Harry was with when his scar started hurting. She is described as evil and twisted.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who has a hurt scar. He is advised to tell Dumbledore about it.

relationships.description: Dumbledore cares about Harry's scar, as evidenced by the conversation where he is advised to tell Dumbledore about his hurt scar.
Harry was with Umbridge when his scar started hurting.
